18.You Ought To Know ----------------------------------------------------------------Then Jerico were a British rock band from the late 1980s who enjoyed limited success with two albums:-

    * First (The Sound Of Music) - 1987. This album reached number 35 in the UK Albums Chart.
    * The Big Area - 1989. This album went gold and reached number 4 in the UK Albums Chart.

Then Jerico produced two albums. The singles "Big Area" (a love song about Mark Shaw's big area) and "Sugar Box" the best known songs taken from these. "Big Area" was the greatest success the group would have, peaking at number 13 in the UK.

The song "Big Area" was featured in the 1989 science fiction film "Slipstream" starring Mark Hamill.
[ WIKIPEDIA : http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Then_Jericho ]
